achievements_certifications.name: Topper of My Branch
achievements_certifications.description: I secured the highest academic rank in my branch with a CGPA of 8.95, maintaining excellent grades throughout my academic journey.

achievements_certifications.name: Top 1% in NPTEL IIT Bombay Demystifying Networks Exam
achievements_certifications.description: Ranked among the top 1% in a national-level networking exam conducted by IIT Bombay, demonstrating strong technical and analytical skills.

achievements_certifications.name: CS50 Web Development Course Completion
achievements_certifications.description: Completed CS50 Web Development using Python and JavaScript and gained strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, CI/CD principles, security, and Django.

achievements_certifications.name: GeeksforGeeks Coding Challenge Winner
achievements_certifications.description: Declared a winner of the GFG 160 Days Challenge for consistently solving problems, improving competitive programming and problem-solving skills.
achievements_certifications.skills: Competitive programming, consistency, data structures and algorithms

achievements_certifications.name: 3rd Winner - 39th MPYSC Innovation Challenge
achievements_certifications.description: Won 3rd place for developing a Smart Home Automation project at the MP Young Scientist Congress, showcasing innovation and technical expertise.

leadership_activities.name: Competitive Programming Student Coordinator
leadership_activities.description: Selected as the Competitive Programming Coordinator to guide students in problem-solving, organize coding sessions, and promote a coding culture.
leadership_activities.skills: Leadership, mentoring, data structures and algorithms

leadership_activities.name: Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future
leadership_activities.description: Selected for Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future, a program focused on technical skill-building, career growth, and professional development.
leadership_activities.skills: Soft skills, career development, technology fundamentals

leadership_activities.name: Lead - GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter (MITS)
leadership_activities.description: Leading the GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter at MITS, collaborating with peers to organize coding challenges and mentor students in problem-solving.

leadership_activities.name: Student Coordinator - Innovation & DIY Club
leadership_activities.description: Guiding students in hands-on IoT projects at the Innovation & DIY Club, fostering technical skills and encouraging innovative thinking.
leadership_activities.skills: IoT, embedded systems, project management, technical problem-solving
